title: DTA 6

controls: WASD: MoveMouse: Look around and aimScroll Wheel: Change weaponE: Enter/Exit vehicles, pick up itemsQ: Open phoneShift: Use nitro in carsF: Slow timeC: HandbrakeX: Look backP: Reload last save

fullContent: Home› GTADTA 6By OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenDTA 6 is a free browser-based game inspired by the iconic open-world crime genre. You play as Jack, a daring gang member, navigating a snow-covered city filled with endless opportunities for adventure, mischief, and chaos. Explore the streets, drive stolen cars, evade police or engage in intense shootouts. DTA 6 offers free, action-packed gameplay that brings the excitement of console games like GTA straight to your browser.⚠ Mature Content WarningDTA 6 may feature intense open-world action, graphic violence, strong language, and adult themes. This game is intended for mature audiences and may be inappropriate for younger players. If you’re seeking a more family-friendly experience, please check out our other titles. Player discretion is advised.ControlsWASD: MoveMouse: Look around and aimScroll Wheel: Change weaponE: Enter/Exit vehicles, pick up itemsQ: Open phoneShift: Use nitro in carsF: Slow timeC: HandbrakeX: Look backP: Reload last saveHow to Play DTA 6Getting StartedBegin your adventure as Jack, a gang member in a snowy city. Use the controls to move around and explore your home and surroundings.Go out and familiarize yourself with the map, nearby vehicles, and accessible shops.Making MoneyCollect cash scattered across the city streets or pick it up from people.Engage in more daring activities like robbing stores or stealing cars for a big payout.Press Q to open your mobile and use your phone to manage your money or purchase upgrades.Exploring the CityWalk, ride or drive through the city to discover new areas, shops and hidden items.Find special vehicles or unique spots to unlock exciting opportunities.Keep an eye out for hidden Easter eggs throughout the city for bonus rewards or just for fun.Engaging in CrimesTo rise through the ranks, commit crimes like stealing vehicles or messing up with pedestrians.Be prepared to fight back if the police come after you.Avoid drawing too much attention unless you’re ready to face the cops.Regularly visit the shop for better weapons and gear to stay ahead.Evading the PoliceKeep track of your Wanted Stars in DTA 6. The more crimes you commit, the more the police will hunt you down.Use nitro for a quick getaway or to outpace the cops during high-speed chases.Lose Wanted Stars by evading the cops, finding a safe spot, or fighting back.Killing cops can reduce your Wanted Stars, but it might also escalate the tension!Buying Weapons and VehiclesVisit the weapon shop to purchase guns and ammo.Use your in-game phone to buy new vehicles and upgrade your inventory.Using Special AbilitiesDTA 6 Jack has 2 special abilitiesSlow Time: Use the F button to slow down time and gain an edge in critical moments.Nitro Boost: Press Shift while driving to activate nitro for high-speed chases or getaways.Saving Your ProgressSave your game through the Save Button on your phone or walk in your house.Always save before risky missions or confrontations to avoid losing progress.If you fail or want to restart, press P to reload your last saved game.DeveloperDTA 6 is created by Vsegon.Free GTA GamesDTA 6 is the perfect pick for fans of crime-filled, open-world adventures. Whether you’re stealing cars, battling the police, or simply exploring the city, this browser-based game delivers all the thrills without the need for downloads or expensive hardware. Let the chaos begin, and see how long you can survive as Jack, the ultimate gang member! If you enjoyed DTA you may also like other GTA games such as Stickman GTA City, offering more mission-based gameplay where you can also explore a mafia city with cars, tanks, helicopters and more!This article was updated on March 17, 20251 Player3DActionAdventureBattleCarDrivingFreeGTAGunShootingSimulatorTrafficUnityWeapon
